question: Who is the author of the book ‘Finding the Gaps’?
explanation: Former Australian cricket umpire Simon Taufel launched his maiden book Finding the Gaps at Trump Tower in Pune recently. In his book, he recalls how he survived 2009 Lahore attack. Taufel, who was earlier a member of the ICC Elite umpire panel, won five consecutive ICC Umpire of the Year awards between 2004 and 2008, and was considered the best umpire in the world during his time.
